name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Blood and Wine
summary: Geralt is in the southern province of Toussaint where a monstrous serial killer is targeting knights with a dark past. Geralt and his old vampire friend investigate the killer's motives.

name: Red Dead Redemption II
summary: Amidst the decline of the Wild West at the turn of the 20th century, outlaw Arthur Morgan and his gang struggle to cope with the loss of their way of life.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
summary: A monster hunter for hire embarks on an epic journey to find his former apprentice before The Wild Hunt can capture her and bring about the destruction of the world.

name: The Last of Us
summary: In a hostile, post-pandemic world, Joel and Ellie, brought together by desperate circumstances, must rely on each other to survive a brutal journey across what remains of the United States.

name: Mass Effect: Legendary Edition
summary: A compilation of the first three Mass Effect games.

name: God of War
summary: After wiping out the gods of Mount Olympus, Kratos moves on to the frigid lands of Scandinavia, where he and his son must embark on an odyssey across a dangerous world of gods and monsters.

name: Persona 5 Royal
summary: A group of high school students create a vigilante group to expose the crimes of corrupt adults but soon find themselves in the midst of a worldwide conspiracy and targeted by powerful individuals who would do anything to silence them.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
summary: A young Kokiri boy discovers that his destiny is to free the Seven Sages and save the land of Hyrule from the treacherous sorcerer Ganondorf.

name: Metal Gear Solid
summary: A crack government anti-terrorist squad takes over an obscure Alaskan nuclear disposal facility. Solid Snake is up for the task to infiltrate the facility, rescue the two hostages and thwart the terrorists' plans.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Hearts of Stone
summary: Geralt is forced by a seemingly harmless merchant with sinister powers to complete three difficult tasks for a bored immortal, once a troubled nobleman who made a deal with the devil.

name: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
summary: Thrown back into the dangerous underworld he'd tried to leave behind, Nathan Drake must decide what he's willing to sacrifice to save the ones he loves.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
summary: Three very different criminals team up for a series of heists in the corrupt city of Los Santos.

name: Mass Effect 2
summary: After being revived from death and having to join a pro-human organization without a choice, Commander Shepard must assemble a team, battle a new threat, and make tough choices in order to save the galaxy from total annihilation once more.

name: Half-Life: Alyx
summary: A VR game of an impossible fight against a vicious alien race known as the Combine, set between the events of Half-Life and Half-Life 2. Play as Alyx Vance, humanity's only chance for survival.

name: Metal Gear Solid 3: Subsistence
summary: Enhanced version of  (2004) with many added features; such as the free range camera, new camouflage outfits, bonus levels and a theater mode.

name: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater
summary: In 1964, a U.S. government operative codenamed "Snake" must infiltrate mountainous Soviet territory to rescue a scientist building a weapon of terrible power.

name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
summary: A republic soldier, training to become a Jedi Knight, is given the task of halting the conquest of Darth Malak by discovering the location of a weapon known as the Star Forge.

name: Chrono Trigger
summary: Crono, a young boy, is thrust to adventure by destiny to destroy an oncoming threat that will destroy the world in 1999.

name: Final Fantasy VII
summary: A former soldier from an evil company joins a mercenary clan to fight the company he once served.

name: Bloodborne: The Old Hunters
summary: In this DLC for Bloodborne, the player-Hunter is transported to the sinister Hunter's Nightmare, a demented place where hunters who become drunk with blood are sent to.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
summary: After a century of hibernation, Link reawakens to once again save a ruined Hyrule from a great evil.

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
summary: After escaping execution, the last living Dragonborn must grow in strength and power to defeat the dragons that have once again begun to plague the land of Skyrim.

name: Portal 2
summary: Many years after "Portal," Chell reawakens at Aperture Science and tries to stop GLADoS once again with the help of Wheatley, who has his own plans for the historical facility.

name: Batman: Arkham City
summary: When part of Gotham is turned into a private reserve for criminals known as Arkham City, all hell is sure to break loose, and the Dark Knight is the only one who can stop it.

name: Red Dead Redemption
summary: A former outlaw is forced by the federal government to hunt down the members of his old gang.

name: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves
summary: After being tracked down by Harry Flynn, Nathan Drake goes on a quest for Marco Polo's lost fleet. However when things take an unexpected turn for the worst, Drake must rely on those closest to him in order to find the Cintomani Stone.

name: Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots
summary: When the nations of the world rely upon private military companies to fight their battles for them, renegade Liquid Ocelot emerges as the head of a potent coalition of mercenary powers. Solid Snake returns to save the world once again.

name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
summary: A family tragedy prompts gangster Carl "CJ" Johnson to return home, only to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which he must regain control of the streets before it gets even worse.

name: Half-Life 2
summary: Dr. Freeman is taken out of stasis by his "employer" to help rid the planet of invading aliens forces known as the Combine that entered through the portals he helped create.

name: Silent Hill 2
summary: After receiving a letter from his late wife, from Silent Hill, James Sunderland makes his way to the town in an attempt to find her.

name: Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn
summary: Jon Irenicus, a sadistic secretive powerful mage bent on revenge, captures Gorion's ward and his/her party for a diabolical experiment.

name: Planescape: Torment
summary: In the city of Sigil, the only place from which all realities of the Planescape universe can be reached, an immortal amnesiac, the Nameless One, must uncover his past, the mystery of his immortality as well as who's trying to kill him.

name: Fallout 2: A Post-Nuclear Role-Playing Game
summary: In a post-nuclear future, the descendant of an ancient exiled hero must leave his tribe in search of the Garden of Eden Creation Kit, the last chance of survival for his people.

name: Ghost of Tsushima
summary: Set in 1274 on the Tsushima Island, the last samurai, Jin Sakai, must master a new fighting style, the way of the Ghost, to defeat the Mongol forces and fight for the freedom and independence of Japan.

name: Batman: Return to Arkham
summary: Batman: Return to Arkham thrusts players back into the environments of Arkham Asylum and Arkham City with a remastered graphics engine and all DLC.

name: Persona 5
summary: A group of high school students create a vigilante group to expose the crimes of corrupt adults but soon find themselves in the midst of a worldwide conspiracy and targeted by powerful individuals who would do anything to silence them.

name: Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 Remix
summary: A compilation of three classic games, Kingdom Hearts Final Mix (updated version of the original Kingdom Hearts game,  (2007) and  (2009).

name: P.T.
summary: The player must navigate a series of continuously looping hallways, solving cryptic puzzles, all while being hunted by a hostile apparition named Lisa.

name: Persona 4 Golden
summary: A group of high school students discover a hidden TV world called 'The Midnight Channel', an alternate reality infested with shadows that is being used to commit murder. After awakening to their Personas, the group decides to investigate.

name: It Takes Two
summary: Embark on the craziest journey of your life in It Takes Two, a genre-bending platform adventure created purely for co-op. Invite a friend to join for free with Friend's Pass and work ...                 »

name: Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 4
summary: A high school student forms a group that explores a hidden world accessible through TV sets to find a connection between the "realm of shadows" and the mysterious murders in their town.

name: Kingdom Hearts II: Final Mix+
summary: Sora and friends must set out on another adventure to find his long lost friends and stop Organization XIII.

name: Shadow of the Colossus
summary: A young man brings a deceased woman to a forbidden land inhabited by colossal beings said to house the power to revive the dead.

name: Kingdom Hearts II
summary: Sora and friends face mysterious new enemies as they continue their journey to save all worlds, and find Riku and King Mickey.

name: Suikoden II
summary: Three years after the Gate Rune War, the 108 Stars of Destiny once again gather to protect the City-State of Jowston from the invading Kingdom of Highland, led by the demonic Luca Blight.

name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
summary: The wizard Agahnim has abducted seven maidens, intent on using their power to open a portal to the Dark World. Armed with a trusty sword and shield, Link begins a great and treacherous journey.

name: The Secret of Monkey Island
summary: Young pirate wanna-be Guybrush Threepwood sets out to pass the Three Trials, woo the governess Elaine Marley, reach the fabled Monkey Island and vanquish the nefarious ghost pirate LeChuck.

name: Super Mario World
summary: While Mario and Luigi are vacationing in Dinosaur Land, Bowser kidnaps the Princess. Mario and his new dino friend Yoshi go on a mission to save her.

name: Spider-Man
summary: When a new villain threatens New York City, Peter Parker and Spider-Man's worlds collide. To save the city and those he loves, he must rise up and be greater.

name: Detroit: Become Human
summary: Take control of three androids in their quest to discover who they really are.

name: Bloodborne
summary: A hunter awakens in the plagued lands of Yharnam, where the denizens have succumb to beast hood, in an attempt to learn the truth and how to end the plague, unbeknownst of the true horror lurking within the city.

name: The Walking Dead
summary: In a world devastated by the undead, a convicted criminal is given a second chance at life when he comes across a little girl named Clementine.

name: Batman: Arkham Asylum
summary: You control Batman as he fights to subdue The Joker and his fellow inmates when they seize control of the Asylum on Arkham Island.

name: Mass Effect
summary: In a technologically advanced future, an elite human soldier takes command of a prototype star ship and works to defend the galaxy from danger.

name: God of War II
summary: After being betrayed by the gods of Olympus and annulled of his divine powers, Kratos must embark on a journey to meet the Sisters of Fate and take his revenge on Olympus.

name: Resident Evil 4
summary: Six years after the events in Raccoon City, Leon Kennedy, now a federal agent, is sent to a rural part of Spain to rescue the U.S. President's kidnapped daughter, Ashley Graham from a sinister cult.

name: Mafia: The City of Lost Heaven
summary: You play a 1930s mobster as you act out your confession of your rise in the ranks of organized crime.

name: Kingdom Hearts
summary: When his world is destroyed and his friends mysteriously disappear, a young boy named Sora is thrust into a quest to find his missing friends and prevent the armies of darkness from destroying many other worlds.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
summary: After being released from jail, Tommy Vercetti left Liberty City for Vice City, a city overrun by the mob. Now, Tommy is out to make Vice City his home.

name: Max Payne
summary: A troubled NYPD cop is framed for murder and finds himself being hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

name: Deus Ex
summary: In a dark cyberpunk future where poverty, disease, oppression and terrorism are widespread, J.C. Denton, a new cybernetically-enhanced special agent, finds evidence of a massive conspiracy when his brother, also an agent, goes rogue.

name: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
summary: Richter Belmont has vanished just as Castlevania reemerged from the mists. Meanwhile, Alucard, the bastard son of Dracula, has awakened from his eternal slumber, intent on destroying his evil father once and for all.

name: Super Mario Bros. 3
summary: King Koopa has kidnapped Princess Toadstool, taken over all seven kingdoms in the Mushroom World, and put his seven kids in charge of all of them. It's the Mario Brothers to the rescue.

name: Monkey Island 2: LeChuck's Revenge
summary: Having vanquished the ghost pirate LeChuck with a soft drink, Guybrush Threepwood now seeks the treasure of Big Whoop. During his quest he discovers LeChuck is back from the dead. Once again.

name: Half-Life
summary: Dr. Gordon Freeman must fight his way out of a secret research facility after a teleportation experiment goes disastrously wrong.

name: Grim Fandango
summary: Manuel Calavera is a travel agent in The Land of the Dead who has stumbled across a ring of corruption.

name: Fallout: A Post-Nuclear Role-Playing Game
summary: After being sent by the overseer of his vault to search for a new water purifying chip, the player discovers the horrors of post apocalyptic America, and the threat of the Master's Army.

name: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
summary: Ori begins a new journey that goes beyond the forest of Nibel where he uncovers lost secrets, and unearths his true destiny.

name: Resident Evil 2
summary: Re-imagining of  (1998), with a third-person over-the-shoulder view, new details, rearranged and new areas, no more loading screen doors, new puzzle solving opportunities, a gunpowder crafting mechanic and more.

name: Dark Souls III
summary: The fire is fading. Darkness creeps across the land. The Lords of Cinder charged with watching over the First Flame have abandoned their thrones. The Champion of Ash, an undead is chosen to return them to their thrones.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn
summary: In a primitive tribal world where strange, monstrous, animalistic machines roam the wilderness, a brave young female warrior goes on a quest to learn the truth about her mysterious origin and the state the world is in.

name: Mob of the Dead
summary: Mob of the Dead, featured in the DLC pack Uprising for  (2012) introduces a main Zombies map set in Alcatraz Prison around the 1930's.

name: Dark Souls
summary: After narrowly escaping a doomed fate in an asylum, an undead warrior fights his way through the desolate remains of Lordran, once a sprawling utopia lead by the gods, to seek his purpose and fulfill a centuries old prophecy.

name: Mass Effect 3
summary: Earth is under attack by a monstrous race of gigantic living ships known as the Reapers. Even if Commander Shepard could unite all surviving species in the galaxy, only a miracle could save them. Then again, Shepard did come back from the dead.

name: BioShock Infinite
summary: A man is sent to the flying city of Columbia to find a missing girl. However, upon arrival he discovers that the city, its people, and his objective are all not what they seem.

name: Dragon Age: Origins
summary: After four hundred years since the last Blight, a new Archdemon seeks to destroy the land of Ferelden. It is up to the player - as one of the remaining Grey Wardens - to unite the divided armies of Ferelden and save humanity.

name: Gothic II: Night of the Raven
summary: Expansion pack for  (2002) with the addition of a world called Jharkendar, and new attributes, items, and weapons.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
summary: They've travelled through space. They've travelled through time. Now, they'll have to travel through dimensions as their galaxy seems to rip itself apart. Ratchet and Clank must save the universe - again.

name: Assassin's Creed II
summary: Desmond Miles is trained to become a modern-day Assassin through the resurrected memories of ancestor Ezio Auditore da Firenze, who uncovers a massive Templar conspiracy in Renaissance Italy leading to the new Pope.

name: God of War III
summary: Armed with his deadly double-chained blades, Kratos must take on Greek mythology's darkest creatures to destroy Olympus and the mighty Zeus himself.

name: Portal
summary: A test subject wakes up in a scientific facility controlled by a sadistic artificial intelligence and must escape with the help of the only instrument she has--a gun that makes portals.

name: Disco Elysium
summary: You're a detective tasked with solving a murder in the strange world of Elysium. Utilize a new and innovative skill system to be the detective you want to be. Become a hero or an absolute disaster of a human being.

name: BioShock
summary: In 1960, a lone survivor of a plane crash named Jack discovers an abandoned underwater utopia, only to find out that the mystery behind its creation is much more sinister than he first believed.

name: Fallout 3
summary: Centuries following nuclear war, a teen leaves the safety of an underground vault in order to find their father, who left in hopes of creating a water purifier.

name: Gothic II
summary: Rescued from the ruins of the temple of the sleeper, the nameless hero faces another great challenge when Beliar, one of the three gods, summons a tremendous army in the mine valley.

name: Half-Life 2: Episode Two
summary: Gordon Freeman, along with the help of human and non-human allies, continues his fight against the ruthless alien force known as the Combine.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines
summary: Beginning your journey as a new Kindred, you must choose your path to follow the high class Vampire Society, or the lawbreaking group of Anarchs as you find your place in this new world.

name: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door
summary: Mario must find all the seven crystal stars to enter the Thousand-Year-Door and save Princess Peach.

name: God of War
summary: After 10 years of endless nightmares and servitude to the gods of Olympus, Kratos is assigned with a final task, to kill Ares, the God of War.

name: Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne
summary: The brooding cop has left the DEA and returned to the NYPD. When his latest case ends up involving the thought-dead femme fatale Mona Sax, he finds that his journey through the night is far from over.

name: Metal Gear Solid
summary: Solid Snake is called upon from his home in Alaska to infiltrate an enemy base searching for Metal Gear.

name: Resident Evil
summary: Remake of the first game in which the RPD squad, Jill and Chris, are forced to flee into a mysterious mansion. Featuring new gameplay mechanics, revised puzzles, additional explorable areas, a revised script, and new story details.

name: X-COM: UFO Defense
summary: Because aliens are attempting to invade the Earth, you will have to command X-com, an international organisation to fight the alien invasion. By shooting down UFO's and recovering ...                 »

name: Shenmue II
summary: Ryo continues his quest of vengence for his father. In his second outing Ryo must travel to Hong Kong to have a lethal face off with Lan-Di.

name: Final Fantasy X
summary: A celebrated young athlete is drawn from his futuristic hometown and convenient lifestyle to a harsh and techno-phobic land by a mysterious force only known as Sin.

name: Baldur's Gate II: Throne of Bhaal
summary: The main character, Gorion's ward, and his or her party must overcome five children of the dead god Bhaal, who've raised armies to conquer the world through carnage and claim their father's sinister throne and title.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
summary: After becoming the hero of Hyrule, Link stumbles into the enchanted land of Termina, where a falling moon will crush the world in three days.

name: Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis
summary: Indiana Jones must fight the nazis again in search for Atlantis and a newly discovered mineral of unbelievable power, the Orichalcum.

name: Shenmue
summary: Ryo, a respected Japanese student sees his father killed in front of his own eyes. He sets out to find the man in charge of his fathers death and the mystery of who and why?

name: StarCraft
summary: In 2499 in the Koprulu sector, a ferocious collective race known as the Zerg arrives to massacre the exiled human colonies while a highly advanced race, the Protoss, intervenes to exterminate the Zerg.

name: Super Metroid
summary: Samus Aran returns to the brooding planet Zebes to recover the last metroid from the Space Pirates.

name: GoldenEye 007
summary: James Bond must track down agent-turned-terrorist Alec Trevelyan to stop the launch of a powerful satellite. Play the game that set the stage for the First-person shooter genre on the console.

name: Super Mario 64
summary: When the evil Bowser steals 120 power stars and traps Princess Peach within the walls of her own castle, it's up to Mario to save her once again.

name: Silent Hill
summary: Harry awakes from a car crash to notice his daughter, Cheryl, vanished. As he searches through the eerie town of Silent Hill, a terrifying descent into the unknown is set.

name: Resident Evil 2
summary: Two months after the mansion events, the deadly T-virus escapes into the streets of Raccoon City. Leon Kennedy and Claire Redfield find the police office left abandoned. In an underground facility the story of Umbrella Corp. gets unfolded.

name: The Curse of Monkey Island
summary: After unwittingly turning his true love Elaine into solid gold with a cursed engagement ring, Guybrush Threepwood must find a map, a ship and a crew, sail to Blood Island and track down an uncursed diamond ring to reverse the curse.

name: Gabriel Knight: Sins of the Fathers
summary: Gabriel Knight, the owner of a New Orleans, Louisiana bookstore, gets tangled up in the investigation of a series of voodoo-related murders currently plaguing the city.

name: Hades
summary: Hades is a rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion and Transistor, in which you defy the god of death as you hack and slash your way out of the Underworld of Greek myth.

name: Super Mario Odyssey
summary: Mario must travel to worlds unknown in order to stop Bowser from marrying Princess Peach.

name: Psychonauts 2
summary: The game will pick up after the conclusion of Psychonauts in the Rhombus of Ruin, following Zanotto's rescue, the team returns to Psychonaut Headquarters, where Raz discovers that the ...                 »

name: Yakuza 0
summary: Kiryu and Majima, both Yakuza's who are in different cities in Japan in 1988, as the fate of the two characters become intertwined in a gritty, violent, and often touching narrative.

name: Batman: Arkham Knight
summary: With his back against the wall, Batman turns to his closest allies to help him save Gotham City from the clutches of Scarecrow and the Arkham Knight's army. A familiar face also returns to give The Dark Knight a message he cannot ignore.

name: The Last of Us: Left Behind
summary: Find out what set Ellie on her course to the life changing events in  (2013), whilst filling in the gaps during winter with Joel.

name: Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception
summary: Treasure hunter Nathan Drake embarks on a quest in search of the Atlantis of the Sands while battling an ancient, sinister organization.

name: Xenoblade Chronicles
summary: In a world of endless ocean, all life lives on the decaying corpses of two gigantic titans, the Bionis and Mechonis. When the army of Mechonis attacks his home, young scientist Shulk sets out for revenge.

name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
summary: The Call of Duty series returns this time into a modern day setting. The player takes control of a character nicknamed "Soap," for the majority of the campaign and will need to progress through many modern warfare scenarios.

name: Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 3
summary: A new student arrives at a school full of monsters that attack at night. A team of Persona users recruit him to help battle alongside them to rid the monsters for good.

name: Gothic
summary: An unnamed hero gets thrown in a colony of prisoners surrounded by a magical barrier.

name: Super Mario Galaxy
summary: When Princess Peach is abducted as part of Bowser's galaxy creation scheme, stalwart plumber Mario must leap to her rescue, with the help of new celestial friends and powers.

name: Mother 3
summary: A young boy from the island of Tazmily must defeat a familiar enemy and his many cohorts, meeting many new friends along the way.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
summary: Link, a young man from a small farming village, finds Hyrule is being consumed by an otherworldly twilight. Guided by a strange pixie named Midna, he endeavors to return light to the land and confront the usurper king Zant.

name: Heroes of Might and Magic III: The Restoration of Erathia
summary: Turn-based strategy game in which the player goes through 7 different campaigns, controlling a number of heroes that command an army of creatures inspired by myth and legend.

name: Metal Gear Solid: The Twin Snakes
summary: A retired mercenary is called upon by the U.S. government to handle a hostile takeover of an Alaskan military base by his former special forces group. A remake of  (1998).

name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Substance
summary: Enhanced version of  (2001); adding VR missions, 5 Short-Story missions with Snake at the helm, "Skater Mode" and more.

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
summary: After his sister gets kidnapped from their peaceful island, a young boy aims to emulate the Hero of Time by saving her.

name: System Shock 2
summary: An agent is deployed on a mission to explore a distant planet, but instead wakes up from his cryosleep five months later only to discover that the ship's artificial intelligence has been corrupted and the humans infected by an alien race.

name: StarCraft: Brood War
summary: After the events of  (1998) the Protoss try to unite their divided race while still fighting the weakened Zerg which is also attacked by human expedition from Earth.

name: Diablo II: Lord of Destruction
summary: Warriors and rebels stand against Diablo and his malignant forces as they prepare to fight in an apocalyptic conflict. In the expansion, Baal takes over command of Diablo's forces as the end of the war draws near.

name: Diablo II
summary: Evil has survived. Diablo, the Lord of Terror, now seeks to free his demonic brothers. The armies of the High Heavens are forbidden to interfere with Diablo's plan.

name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty
summary: Two years after the death of Solid Snake, a rookie FOX-HOUND agent, on his first mission, infiltrates an offshore decontamination facility to rescue the President.

name: Jagged Alliance 2
summary: When an overthrown and believed to be dead Monarch, Enrico Chivaldori, witnesses his country enslaved under the cruel regime of his former wife; Queen Deidranna, the former ruler contacts a...                 »

name: The Longest Journey
summary: April Ryan is a young visual-arts student in Venice, Newport. She's been having some strange dreams lately, but little does she know about the important role she'll have in changing the future.

name: The Neverhood
summary: Long ago, a mysterious being known as Hoborg created a world called the Neverhood, made entirely of an odd substance known as "Klay." However, Hoborg was lonely and, using a mystical "life seed", created a "Klay man" that he called Klogg.

name: Final Fantasy VI
summary: A mysterious woman joins a group of mercenaries in order to find out about her destiny and means of saving the world from an evil madman.

name: Day of the Tentacle
summary: A disembodied tentacle is accidentally exposed to nuclear waste, giving it human abilities and an ambition to take over the world.

name: Baldur's Gate
summary: The main character, ward of mystical monk Gorion, whose name, sex, race and class are defined by the players, leaves his order's keep for the first time and starts a journey to discover his true identity. But someone wants him dead.

name: The Beast Within: A Gabriel Knight Mystery
summary: Shortly after moving to Rittersburg to take over duties as the lone "Schattenjager", Gabriel Knight is called by the townsfolk to investigate the killing of a child believed to be caused by a werewolf.

name: Fire Emblem: Three Houses
summary: On the continent of Fódlan, divided between three rival nations, a newly hired professor at Garreg Mach Monastery must choose a nation to support and guide just as a conspiracy begins to reopen Fódlan's dark and violent past.

name: Yakuza Kiwami 2
summary: Kazuma Kiryu is called back to Kamurocho and tasked with finding a new chairman for the Tojo Clan, which brings him into conflict with the legendary 'Dragon Of Kansai'.

name: Steins;Gate
summary: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

name: Death Stranding
summary: Deliveryman Sam Porter must travel across a ravaged wasteland and reconnect the city states of America formed after a mysterious apocalyptic event dubbed 'death stranding' left the world in ruins and plagued by supernatural tar creatures.

name: Undertale
summary: Enter the Underground, a massive subterranean cave where monsters, who once lived harmoniously with humans on the surface, now have been banished after losing a war with humanity.

name: NieR: Automata
summary: In the forsaken wasteland below, the war between the machines and the androids rages on. A war that is soon to unveil the long-forgotten truth of this world.

name: Life Is Strange
summary: An awkward photography student named Max discovers her ability to rewind time, and reunites with her estranged best friend Chloe to investigate the mysterious disappearance of a local girl.

name: Tales from the Borderlands: A Telltale Games Series
summary: Corporate stooge Rhys, and Con woman Fiona team up to discover the secret of an alien vault on the dangerous planet Pandora.

name: The Wolf Among Us
summary: As Bigby Wolf, the big bad wolf in human form, you will discover that the brutal, bloody murder of a Fable is just a taste of things to come when another dead Fable is found which starts the hunt for a serial killer.

name: Far Cry 3
summary: While skydiving, Jason Brody and his friends land on an island overrun by pirates, where Jason is torn between fighting for the Rakyat resistance and rescuing his friends.

name: South Park: The Stick of Truth
summary: As the New Kid, discover the lost Stick of Truth, and earn your place at the side of Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny as their new friend.

name: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings
summary: Witcher Geralt must track down a mysterious assassin known as the Kingslayer, who appears to also have the powers of a witcher. Is the Kingslayer simply working for the leaders of a non-human rebellion or is there more to this mystery?

name: Super Mario Galaxy 2
summary: Mario goes back in the galaxy to save Princess Peach from Bowser.

name: Heroes of Might and Magic III: The Shadow of Death
summary: Second expansion pack for  (1999).

name: Kingdom Hearts: Birth by Sleep
summary: Ten years before Sora held the Keyblade, three young Keyblade wielders bound by friendship, face being torn apart by the sinister monsters terrorizing other worlds and the manipulative mastermind behind them.

name: Okami
summary: A cel-shaded action game set in feudal Japan, in which the wolf deity Amaterasu defends the land from evil forces.

name: Grand Theft Auto IV
summary: Niko Bellic comes to Liberty City, America to live the good life, but ends up having to assist his dangerously indebted cousin Roman with his financial troubles, by any (mostly illegal) means necessary.

name: The Warriors
summary: The Warriors, a gang from Coney Island, go to a gang leader's meeting, when suddenly the gang leader is shot and killed. Framed for this murder, they must travel all the way back to Coney with 60,000 gang members standing in their way.

name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion
summary: After being freed by the Emperor of Tamriel, the hero must prevent the gates of Oblivion from spreading throughout the Empire.

name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II - The Sith Lords
summary: You play an exiled and depowered Jedi Knight who has returned to the Republic and must restore both your powers and the devastated Jedi Order to challenge the Sith.

name: Sly 2: Band of Thieves
summary: Two years after defeating Clockwerk, Sly Cooper and his band of thieves must recover and destroy all of the stolen Clockwerk parts from a sinister organization before their old nemesis can return from the dead.

name: Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne
summary: Survivors in the reign of chaos try to resolve their differences in a new world, that was shaped after the fall of the Burning Legion.

name: Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem
summary: Over the course of two millenia, twelve men and women are linked together by an accursed book known as the Tome of Eternal Darkness.

name: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind
summary: The protagonist travels by Morrowind, eastern province of the Septim Empire in Tamriel. He/she can save it from enslavement or explore for personal purposes.

name: Thief: The Dark Project
summary: Unbeknownst to him, a cynical but witty master-thief Garrett will become a key player in the secret war between the cult of builders and the cult of pagans in a medieval city where certain types of magic and advanced technology exist.

name: Undying
summary: Former soldier Patrick Galloway receives a plea for help from his old friend and former comrade in arms Jeremiah Covenant.

name: Super Mario RPG: Legend of the Seven Stars
summary: Just as Mario trounces Bowser for the millionth time, a giant, malevolent sword crashes into Bowser's keep, casting Mario, Princess Toadstool and Bowser far and wide, and breaking seven pieces from the wish-granting Star Road.

name: The Operative: No One Lives Forever
summary: A 1960's female spy must battle an eccentric terrorist organization in this classic first person shooter, a stylish and tongue-in-cheek spoof of Cold War era James Bond.

name: Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos
summary: Years after the fall of the Orcish Horde to the human Alliance of Lordaeron, the remaining humans and orcs find themselves facing a common enemy: the demons of the Burning Legion and their armies of undead monsters.

name: Xenogears
summary: Young warrior and artist Fei Fong Wong sets off on a journey that tests his faith as well as courage as he is suddenly thrown into a battle where no one is who they seem.

name: Pokémon Red Version
summary: Play as a young Pokémon trainer trying to catch all 150 Pokémon.

name: Broken Sword: Circle of Blood
summary: George Stobbart, an American tourist in Paris, attempts to unravel a conspiracy when he witnesses a bomb attack on a small Parisian cafe.

name: EarthBound
summary: Ness, a boy from Onett, Eagleland, teams up with new friends to defeat an Evil Destroyer named Giygas. During the epic pursuits, Ness and his allies attempt to find the sacred Eight Melodies.

name: Resident Evil
summary: The RPD are investigating strange cannibalized corpses on the outskirts of the city. The Alpha squad, Jill and Chris, are sent to locate missing team members. While there, mutated dogs cause them to flee into a supposedly abandoned mansion.

name: Super Mario Bros.
summary: A plumber named Mario and his brother Luigi travel through the Mushroom Kingdom to save the princess from the evil Bowser.

name: Titanic: Adventure Out of Time
summary: A video game about a british espionage agent sent back in time to a failed mission aboard Titanic. At stake: The fate of the entire world!

name: The Pandora Directive
summary: In a neo-noir post-WWIII future, an old man hires Tex Murphy, a witty mellow private detective, to find his friend, a former government scientist. The clues lead Tex to a serial killer, NSA and an ominous project called Pandora.

name: Blade Runner
summary: You play a blade runner investigating a series of violent replicant crimes, only to discover far more than you bargained for.

name: Wing Commander III: Heart of the Tiger
summary: When the Terran Confederation faces the possibility of humanity losing the war with the Kilrathi, Colonel Christopher Blair (Mark Hamill), who the Kilrathi have dubbed "The Heart of the Tiger", is summoned.

name: Hollow Knight
summary: This is the story of a knight, in a quest to uncover the secrets of the long-abandoned kingdom of the Hallownest insects, whose depths attract the adventurous and brave with the promise of treasure or the answer to ancient mysteries.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn: The Frozen Wilds
summary: Aloy's battle with the machines continues when she travels to The Cut, the home of the Banuk. There, she finds an AI that is being worshiped, and a mysterious 'Daemon' constantly attacking the Banuk.

name: Divinity: Original Sin II
summary: Set in a fantasy world where a form of energy known as Source, and individuals called Sourcerers can manipulate this energy, are hunting down an organization to protect their world from the evil Voidwokens who are drawn by that energy.

name: Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair
summary: 16 students from the famous Hope's Peak Academy are forced to live on an island, or kill each other in order to escape.

name: Enderal: The Shards of Order
summary: 2 years after the events of "Nehrim", the world of Vyn has fallen into chaos, prompting a Nehrimese refugee to travel to the isolated continent of Enderal to start over, unaware of the threatening, mysterious challenges he would soon face.

name: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
summary: Compilation of Master Chief's entire story. Featuring a re-mastered Halo 2: Anniversary, along with Halo: Anniversary, Halo 3, Halo 4, Halo Nightfall, and access to the Halo 5 Multiplayer Beta.

name: Inside
summary: Hunted and alone, a boy finds himself drawn into the center of a dark project.

name: BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea
summary: 1958. After the events of  (2013) and on the eve of the civil war that will destroy the underwater city, Elizabeth goes to Rapture to find Booker DeWitt and offers him her help to investigate the disappearance of an orphan girl.

name: Fire Emblem: Awakening
summary: During a turbulent era, Chrom, the prince of Ylisse and descendant of the Hero-King Marth, leads The Shepherds in observing and combating the bizarre activities of the neighboring country Plegia.

name: Until Dawn
summary: A group of teenagers spend the weekend in a ski lodge on the anniversary of their friends' disappearance, unaware that they are not alone.

name: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
summary: After awakening from a nine year coma, Big Boss forms a new mercenary group called, Diamond Dogs, and teams up with his former rival, Ocelot, to track down the men responsible for the destruction of MSF.

name: Tomb Raider
summary: Armed with only the raw instincts and physical ability, experience Lara Croft's intense origin story from a young woman to a hardened survivor.

name: Fallout: New Vegas
summary: After surviving a bullet to the head, Courier Six traverses the post-apocalyptic Mojave desert in search of the men who wronged him, while making an impact on thousands in the process.

name: Dead Space 2
summary: Set three years after the events of the first, Isaac Clarke's fight against a new Necromorph outbreak on the Sprawl, a space station above Saturn's largest moon, Titan.

name: Pokémon SoulSilver Version
summary: Unravel mysteries as you journey through new places such as the Ruins of Alph, meet new people such as the Kimono girls of Ecruteak City, and battle Team Rocket as they make their comeback.

name: Pokémon HeartGold Version
summary: Unravel mysteries as you journey through new places such as the Ruins of Alph, meet new people such as the Kimono girls of Ecruteak City, and battle Team Rocket as they make their comeback.

name: Heavy Rain
summary: As a child goes missing, his father tirelessly works to rescue him, while a journalist, an FBI agent, and a private detective try to identify his kidnapper known only as the "Origami Killer".

name: Demon's Souls
summary: A remake of the 2009 video game, by the same name,  (2009).

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2
summary: A massacre at a Russian airport leads to a war between Russia and the United States. Meanwhile, a Task Force is sent to find the perpetrators and bring the bloodshed to an end.

name: Dead Space
summary: Engineer Isaac Clarke and his crew get stranded on a large, abandoned mining ship. There, Clarke needs to repair the giant ship while battling nasty aliens and solving the mystery of what happened to the ship.

name: Demon's Souls
summary: A remake of the 2009 video game, by the same name,  (2009).

name: Resident Evil Village
summary: Ethan Winters' world suddenly comes crashing down when Chris Redfield's appearance sets off a chain of events that ultimately leads him to a mysterious village.

name: World of Warcraft: Wrath of the Lich King
summary: The Lich King Arthas has set in motion events that could lead to the extinction of all life on Azeroth. Only the mightiest heroes can oppose the Lich King's will and end his reign of terror for all time.

name: Yakuza: Like a Dragon
summary: Ichiban Kasuga, a low-level Yakuza member looking to prove his self-worth, and follows him and his motley crew of unlikely allies as they attempt to rise from rags to riches in this modern human drama.

name: Outer Wilds
summary: Outer Wilds is an exploration game about curiosity, roasting marshmallows, and unraveling the mysteries of the cosmos.

name: Medieval II: Total War
summary: A diplomatic, strategic war game set between the years 1080 and 1530, focusing on medieval warfare, religion and politics in Europe, North Africa and the Middle East.

name: StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty
summary: Four years after the events of  (1998), Jim Raynor fights against the Dominion and begins a search for artifacts when at the same time the Zerg attack once again.

name: Half-Life 2: Episode One
summary: Gordon Freeman and Alyx Vance must escape City 17 following the explosion of its fusion reactor.

name: Halo 3
summary: Master Chief and the Arbiter must join together to attack the Covenant and destroy the Flood.

name: Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves
summary: Sly Cooper and the gang must recruit a team of world-class thieves in order to penetrate his family vault of massive wealth and collect his inheritance before an evil genius retrieves it first.

name: Star Wars: Battlefront II
summary: Play as the foot soldier of the galaxy's greatest factions and wage war across countless planets.

name: Dragon Quest VIII
summary: The game begins with the court jester of the kingdom of Trodain, Dhoulmagus, stealing an ancient scepter and casting a spell on Trodain castle.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal
summary: Ratchet and Clank return to the Solana Galaxy to combat Dr. Nefarious, a villain from Qwark's shady past, who wishes to turn all organic life into robots.

name: Hitman: Blood Money
summary: A larger, more powerful agency is systematically eliminating assassins in a series of hits, who are all from Agent 47's contract killing firm, The International Contract Agency (ICA).

name: Ico
summary: On a distant island, there is a legend that anyone born with horns will bring about calamity. When such a boy is locked away in a fortress, he must work together with a girl named Yorda to flee before they can be claimed by the spirits.

name: Sanitarium
summary: After a horrific car crash your character ends up in an asylum. You must find out how you came to be there and recover your identity.

name: Jet Set Radio Future
summary: A group of graffiti spraying, roller blading, teens called, "The GGs", have to stop a mega corporate enterprise known as, "The Rokkaku Group" and their leader, "Gouji Rokkaku" who is the ...                 »

name: Metroid Prime
summary: A Space Pirate distress signal draws bounty hunter Samus Aran to Tallon IV, a world she discovers is being consumed by a terrible poison.

name: Pokémon Gold Version
summary: Role playing game for the Game Boy Advance, introducing the second generation of Pokémon, where you are on a quest to master Pokémon battling.

name: Halo: Combat Evolved
summary: Super-soldier John-117, Master Chief of the United Nations Space Command, must battle a genocidal alien race known as the Covenant following his violent crash-landing on Halo, an ancient and mysterious ring-world.

name: Civilization
summary: Turn-based strategy game Civilization begins in 4000 BC and allows players to expand and develop their empires through the ages from the ancient era until modern and near-future times.

name: Arcanum: Of Steamworks and Magick Obscura
summary: You are the sole survivor of IFS Zephyr crash and the noble gnome has just passed away before your eyes after giving you a strange ring and asking to deliver it to "the boy".

name: Freespace 2
summary: 32 years have passed since the events of Descent: Freespace. A rebellion is threatening the stability the galactic Terran-Vasudan alliance while a mysterious portal to a Shivan-infested nebula is discovered.

name: Pokémon Crystal Version
summary: A remake of the Gold and Silver versions of Pocket Monsters, with new animations, characters, and a new female trainer.

name: Final Fantasy IX
summary: When bandits try to kidnap the princess, they discover that it's the princess who wants to be kidnapped. But they are chased by an evil queen and an even more powerful entity.

name: Thief II: The Metal Age
summary: After a group of extreme worshipers of new steampunk technology leaves the cult of builders known as the Hammerites to form a cult of their own called the Mechanists, master-thief Garrett is asked to investigate their true intentions.

name: Pokémon Silver Version
summary: Role playing game for the Game Boy Color, introducing the second generation of Pokémon, where you are on a quest to master Pokémon battling.

name: Final Fantasy Tactics
summary: The story of a heroic squire religated to the lost pages of history.

name: Civilization II
summary: Turn-based strategy game Civilization II introduces an isometric view, new concepts such as firepower and hit points, and changes to some units' abilities and strengths.

name: Sam and Max Hit the Road
summary: Two screwball detectives are hired to track a couple of human oddities that went missing from a local Tourist Trap.

name: Crash Bandicoot: Warped
summary: Crash Bandicoot, Aku Aku and Coco travel through time to stop Dr. Cortex and Aku Aku's evil twin brother Uka Uka from enslaving Earth.

name: Freelancer
summary: You play a freelance pilot who makes a living as a mercenary who gets targeted in a conspiracy for alien artifacts.

name: Wing Commander IV: The Price of Freedom
summary: It is several years after mankind's war against the Kilrathi. Col. Christopher Blair is called back into duty by the Terran Confederation to help stop acts of terrorism that appear to be taking place against Confed by Border Worlds forces.

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
summary: Set in a reimagining of 1500s Sengoku era Japan. An unnamed shinobi, tasked with protecting a young lord of mystical lineage, who is left for dead when a powerful samurai attacks and chops off his arm.

name: Forza Horizon 4
summary: Experience a shared world with dynamic seasons. Explore beautiful scenery, collect over 450 cars and become a Horizon Superstar in historic Britain. With highlight the super-car "McLaren Senna", in honor of .

name: Doom Eternal
summary: In this sequel to  (2016), Hell has taken Earth, so it's up to the Doom Slayer, the ultimate demon-killing machine created by a mystical force, to rip and tear the forces of Hell apart. However, Hell is not alone in this fight.

name: Shadow of the Colossus
summary: Remake of  (2005). A young man brings his deceased love to a forbidden land inhabited by colossal beings said to house the power to revive the dead.

name: Celeste
summary: A young woman undertakes the challenge of climbing a mountain with dangerous perils and mysterious powers. Throughout her journey, she is confronted by Part Of Her, her bad side doppelgänger.

name: XCOM 2: War of the Chosen
summary: Expansion pack for  (2016). Twenty years have passed since world leaders offered an unconditional surrender to alien forces. But at the edges of the world a force gathers once again to stand up for humanity.

name: The Walking Dead: The Final Season
summary: Clementine and her adoptive brother, AJ, come across a boarding school inhabited by other children with little memory of life before the apocalypse.

name: Yakuza 6: The Song of Life
summary: Kiryu takes Haruto to the last place Haruka was spotted. There, a new and merciless world of Yakuza awaits the unlikely pair.

name: Dragon Quest XI: Echoes of an Elusive Age
summary: A young boy from a small town learns he is the chosen hero of Yggdrasil, the World Tree, and sets out on an adventure with colorful companions to save the land of Erdrea from an impending darkness.

name: StarCraft II: Legacy of the Void
summary: After the events of  (2013), Hierarch Artanis works to reunite the Protoss factions in order to retake their homeworld of Auir and stop Amon from destroying the galaxy.

name: Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice
summary: Set in the age of Vikings, a broken Celtic warrior named Senua embarks on a haunting vision quest into Viking Hell to fight for the soul of her dead lover.

name: Ori and the Blind Forest
summary: Ori fell from the Spirit Tree in the forest of Nibel during a storm and was adopted by a bear-like creature named Naru, who raised Ori as her own.

name: What Remains of Edith Finch
summary: Edith Finch travels back to the Finch family home in Washington to explore her ancestral history after recent family events drive her to learn more about herself and the Finches.

name: To the Moon
summary: Follows Dr. Eva Rosalene and Dr. Neil Watts (employed by Sigmund Corp.) as they fulfill the lifelong dream of the dying Johnny Wyles.

name: Alien: Isolation
summary: In this first person survival horror adventure set fifteen years after the events of  (1979), Ripley's daughter becomes trapped on an alien-infested space station which holds answers to the mystery of her mother's disappearance.

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two
summary: Left to fend for herself, Clementine has been forced to learn how to survive in a world gone mad. Many months have passed and she is in search of safety.

name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds
summary: Link is yet again tasked with restoring peace to the kingdom of Hyrule after a malevolent sorcerer named Yuga captures Princess Zelda and escapes through a rift to the ruined world of Lorule.

name: Black Mesa
summary: Scientist Gordon Freeman navigates through the titular research facility in New Mexico after a botched experiment.

name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag
summary: A video game where you play as sailor, privateer and assassin Edward Kenway exploring on and around the islands in the Caribbean Sea during the early 17th century.

name: Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch
summary: Oliver discovers that his mother is not dead, but kidnapped and taken hostage by the White Witch.

name: Borderlands 2
summary: A new group of adventurers arrives on the frontier planet Pandora. They are assassinated by Handsome Jack, the most powerful merc on the planet. One of them survives and with the help of a deranged talking robot seeks loot and revenge.
